missing_dependencies.name: supabase_local_environment
missing_dependencies.details: Persistent Docker Compose initialization failure for Supabase services. Even with the official docker-compose.yml and manual schema creation attempts, the Supabase stack (specifically the 'rest' service) remains unhealthy due to schema loading issues. This prevents the local Supabase environment from starting, which is crucial for building, testing, and deploying micro-tools.

missing_dependencies.name: ast_parser
missing_dependencies.details: A tool to parse JavaScript/TypeScript code into an Abstract Syntax Tree (AST) is not available. This limits the depth of code analysis, including dependency graph construction and vector embedding of code blocks.

analysis_summary.project_overview: Zenith is a minimalist social media management platform aiming for 1,000 daily active users. It focuses on simplicity, reliability, and efficient workflows, targeting solopreneurs, creators, and small agencies. Key features include intuitive bulk scheduling, a dual-view content hub (calendar & queue), and basic analytics. The platform emphasizes a product-led growth model with intent-based SEO and psychological engineering.
key_features: Intuitive Bulk Scheduling (CSV & Google Sheets with in-line error correction)
target_audience: Scrappy Solopreneur/Creator (time/money constrained, seeks reliability & simplicity)
DIY Power User (spreadsheet-centric, seeks efficiency & control, robust CSV/Google Sheets integration)
Overburdened Agency Junior (manages multiple clients, seeks seamless multi-account switching & simple approvals)
analysis_summary.market_opportunity: A 'Reliability Gap' exists between overly simplistic tools (Buffer) and overly complex/unreliable enterprise suites (Hootsuite). Zenith aims to fill this 'frustrated middle' by offering enterprise-grade power with SMB usability and reliability, focusing on rock-solid technical performance and exceptional customer support.
strategic_goals: Achieve 1,000 daily active users through a frictionless user acquisition loop.
Implement intent-based SEO strategy (TOFU, MOFU, BOFU).
Utilize psychological engineering in UI/UX design (cognitive fluency, choice architecture, power of default).
Adopt a transparent, value-based, persona-based pricing model.
blocking_issues: Inability to start local Supabase environment due to persistent Docker Compose initialization failures.
Inability to parse AST for deeper code analysis and vector embedding.
